title: AvanType
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : AvanType**

'AvanType' is the foundry of [Israeli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Israel) typeface designer, [Habib Khoury](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Habib%20Khoury). AvanType offers typefaces in the [Latin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Latin), [Arabic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Arabic), and [Hebrew](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hebrew) scripts.

URL: [http://avantype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415044858/http:/avantype.com/ "http://avantype.com/")
author: hrant
